General Information
===================

******[Watch the 2019 State of the City Address Online!](https://youtu.be/455_20t3ZAs)******

Population

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| 2023 Population Estimate (North Central Texas Council of Governments) | 41,685 |
| 2022 Population Estimate ([U.S. Census](https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/popest.html "U.S. Census")) | 40,449 |
| Growth Rate: 2010-2023 | 0.92% |
| 2023 Dallas County Population | 2,687,159 |
| 2023 Dallas / Fort Worth Metro (MSA) Population ([U.S. Census](https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/popest.html "U.S. Census")) | 6,574,000 |

Gender Characteristics

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Male Population | 17,491 | 44.55% |
| Female Population | 21,773 | 55.45% |

Age Characteristics ([U.S. Census Bureau](https://factfinder.census.gov/faces/nav/jsf/pages/community_facts.xhtml "U.S. Census Bureau"))

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Persons under 5 years | 9.5% |
| Persons 5-64 | 41% |
| Persons 65 and over | 9.7% |

Race / Ethnicity

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Race Alone | White - 22.17% |
|  | African American - 72.09% |
|  | Other, All - 2.39% |
| Hispanic, Any Race | 21.2% |
| Combined Race and Ethnicity | White, non-Hispanic (NH) - 7.8% |

Income / Employment

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Median Household Income | $59.952 |
| Unemployment Rate as of March, 2023 | 5.90% |

Information Sources

[U.S. Census Bureau](http://www.census.gov/ "U.S. Census Burea"), [North Central Texas Council of Governments](https://www.nctcog.org/ "North Central Texas Council of Governments"), [Dallas County Appraisal District](http://www.dallascad.org/ "Dallas County Appraisal District"), [National Oceanographic and Atmospheric Administration](http://www.noaa.gov/ "National Oceanographic and Atmospheric Administration"), [U.S. Geological Survey](http://www.usgs.gov/ "U.S. Geological Survey"), [North Texas Real Estate Information System](http://www.ntreis.net/ "orth Texas Real Estate Information System"), [Texas Workforce Commission](http://www.twc.state.tx.us/ "Texas Workforce Commission").

*Updated June 16, 2023*
